name: barcode-pdf-generator
description: Offline desktop app for generating A4 RTL Hebrew PDFs with QR codes
author: Developer

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: npx wait-on http://localhost:5173 && node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && npx electron .
scripts.build: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && npx vite build
